+package java.text;
+
+/**
+ * Provide the least interfaces that replace {@code StringBuffer} with {@code StringBuilder}
+ * as internal string buffer in NumberFormat#format(long) and NumberFormat#format(double).
+ */
+sealed interface StringBuf
+        permits StringBufFactory.StringBufferImpl, StringBufFactory.StringBuilderImpl {
+
+    /**
+     * Return the actual StringBuffer instance
+     *
+     * @return the actual StringBuffer instance
+     */
+    StringBuffer asStringBuffer();
+
+    /**
+     * Return the actual StringBuilder instance.
+     *
+     * @return the actual StringBuilder instance.
+     */
+    StringBuilder asStringBuilder();
+
+    /**
+     * Returns a new {@code String} that contains a subsequence of
+     * characters currently contained in this sequence. The
+     * substring begins at the specified {@code start} and
+     * extends to the character at index {@code end - 1}.
+     *
+     * @param start The beginning index, inclusive.
+     * @param end   The ending index, exclusive.
+     * @return The new string.
+     */
+    String substring(int start, int end);
+
+    /**
+     * Appends the specified string to this character sequence.
+     *
+     * @param str a string.
+     * @return a reference to this object.
+     */
+    StringBuf append(String str);
+
+    /**
+     * Appends the string representation of the {@code char}
+     * argument to this sequence.
+     *
+     * @param c a {@code char}.
+     * @return a reference to this object.
+     */
+    StringBuf append(char c);
+
+    /**
+     * Returns the length (character count).
+     *
+     * @return the length of the sequence of characters currently
+     * represented by this object
+     */
+    int length();
+}
